description: Application for a non-material amendment (general changes to elevations, green walls, chimneys and ramped access) following grant of planning permission ref: P2014/0609/FUL
decision_conditions:
For the avoidance of doubt, Condition 2 of Planning Permission P2014/0609/FUL should now read:

CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 

JW-001, JW-002, JW-010, JW-011, JW-012, JW-020, JW-021, JW-022, JW-100, JW-101, JW-102, JW-103, JW-104, JW-105, JW-106, JW-107, JW-150, JW-151, JW-152, JW-153, JW-154, JW-155, JW-156, JW-157, JW-158, JW-159, JW-160, JW-161, JW-162, JW-163, JW-164, JW-165, JW-166, JW-167, JW-168, JW-169, JW-170, JW-171, JW-172, JW-173, JW-174, JW-175, JW-176, JW-177, JW-178, JW-179, JW-180, JW-181, JW-182, JW-183, JW-184, JW-185, JW-186, JW-187, JW-188, JW-189, JW-190, JW-191, JW-192, JW-193, JW-194, JW-200, 2483-C1.SK-138 Rev P02, 2483-C1.SK-139 Rev P02, 2483-C1.SK-140 Rev P02, 2483-P1.SK-150 Rev P01, 2483-P1.SK-151 Rev P01, 2483-P1.SK-152 Rev P01, 2483-P1.SK-153 Rev P01, JW-220, 2483-P2.SK-141 Rev P02, 2483-P2.SK-142 Rev P02, JW-223, JW-230, 2483-P3.SK-153 Rev P01, 2483-P3.SK-154 Rev P01, JW-233, 2483-P4.SK-151 Rev P01, 2483-P4.SK-152 Rev P01, JW-250, 2483-P5.SK-149 Rev P01, 2483-P5.SK-150 Rev P01, JW-253, 2483-LX.SK-148 Rev P02, 2483-LX.SK-144 Rev P02, JW-262, JW-300, JW-350, JW-351, JW-352, Volume 1 Environmental Statement, Volume 2 Environmental Statement, Volume 3 Environmental Statement, Volume 1 Environmental Statement Addendum, Volume 2 Environmental Statement Addendum, Design & Access Statement, 2483-SK-182 Rev P02, 2483-SK-198 Rev P03.
	
REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
